title: Temple Rickshaw Racing Run.apk
description:
Description
*	There are many racing games in the market which are fast & furious. But very few of them are addictive. 
*	Temple Run Rickshaw is one such fast & furious as well as addictive speed racing game. Temple Run Rickshaw is an amazing racing moto game that will keep you glued. 
*	The player controls the rickshaw that runs on the grand prix circuits. The player also has to be careful as to not come last or he/she will be disqualified.
*	Controls are: 
-	Accelerator to accelerate
-	Break to stop
-	Tilt to move or turn.
*	Gameplay
The player controls a rickshaw running on the racing track raging thunder. As the game begins, the rickshaw starts fast racing. It then proceeds to run forward as the player pushes the accelerator like real racing. The controls the player has over the rickshaw is through accelerator, which helps in speed racing.
There are 5 types of racing modes- Sprint, Circuit, Time attack, Knock-out & Speed trap.
In Sprint there is only 1 lap which has to be topped. If you come in first 3 positions your next level gets unlocked. Similarly, Circuit has 5 laps and to unlock the next level you have to be one of the top 3. 
Time attack levels get unlocked on the basis of your Sprint & Circuit performance. In time attack you have to be the fastest to shine your name on the online leaderboard.
In knock-out, a player gets knocked out in every lap. There are 5 laps in its 1 level. 
Speed trap records your maximum speed of the lap and flashes your name on online leaderboard.
Unlike many other drag racing games which repetitive tracks, Temple Run Rickshaw is a trial xtreme. If the player bumps into an obstacle, the rickshaw is to be moved to and fro to like real racing to get into turbo racing league. The rickshaw can do fast racing, drag racing, hill climb racing, speed racing, real racing as turbo racing league. If the player wants to accelerate he has to click the accelerator button given which would give zombie dash raging thunder in the game.
The objective of the game is to achieve the highest score and fastest speed. Some version of the game feature online leaderboards, allowing players to compete for racing moto games ranking.
*	If you like Car racing, Raging Thunder, CSR Racing, Fast Racing, Drag Racing, Hill Climb Racing, BMX Boy, Racing Moto, Dr. Driving, Moto X Mayhem, Speed Racing, Angry Gran Run, Real Racing, Turbo Racing League, Beach Buggy Blitz, GT Racing, Trial Xtreme, Zombie Dash, Fast & Furious you will like Temple Run Rickshaw.
*	This amazing runner fast & furious rickshaw loves hill climb racing raging thunder. It can go zombie dash or trial xtreme with drag racing. Do not try to hit other rickshaw or your fast racing moto will need Dr. driving. Judge where to take turns and where to be stable, where you have to do hill climb racing or a real racing Car racing
*	Features of the game:
-	The game is similar to CSR racing or BMX boy game. ( Car racing )
-	Temple Run Rickshaw is a fast & furious moto x mayhem game. ( Car race )
-	Rickshaw takes turbo racing league with angry gran run or beach buggy blitz.
-	It can be single player or multi player game. You can challenge your friends on leader boards. Challenge your friends online to a match by tapping on the Temple Run Rickshaw leader board button and then the challenge button! ( Car race )
-	There are 5 kinds of modes Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Sprint, Circuit, Time Attack, Knock-out & Speed Trap.
-	Like CSR racing or BMX boy, zombie dash into the dead or skip the dead ahead. ( Car race )
-	Being based on real and accurate physics with some toony effect, it is probably the most addictive real racing game on mobiles! ( Car race )
-	A perfect time killer! ( Car racing )
*	Tags: Raging Thunder, CSR Racing, Fast Racing, Drag Racing, Hill Climb Racing, BMX Boy, Racing Moto, Dr. Driving, Moto X Mayhem, Speed Racing, Angry Gran Run, Real Racing, Turbo Racing League, Beach Buggy Blitz, GT Racing, Trial Xtreme, Zombie Dash, Fast & Furious, Car race, Car racing
